name: Moto (Jarno Lämsä)
description:
Early development prototype of a cocos2d-x game, created on learning purposes.

Lessons learned during development:

  • DrawNode
  • Custom camera
  • Camera flags and masks
  • Keyboard handling
  • On screen button handling
  • Creating textured terrain
  • Box2d (bodies, fixtures, joints)
  • Box2d cocos2d-x integration
  • R.U.B.E
